title: Roman Mars from 99 Percent Invisible
itunes:title: Roman Mars from 99 Percent Invisible
description:
THIS EPISODE EXCLUSIVELY BROUGHT TO YOU BY NATIVE SOUND RECORDSI am extremely proud to bring you a conversation I had with the host of one of my favorite podcasts around, Roman Mars. His show is called 99 Percent Invisible and focuses on architecture and the undiscovered beauty of the world that surrounds us. We discuss punk culture, building a podcast and Dischord Records. This episode is essential listening, please do yourself a favor and check it out. Brought to you in conjunction with Property of Zack.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
